price: 31. (Recuerda, ¡oh, Muhammad!) cuando le fueron mostrados por la tarde unos veloces corceles de pura raza.
arabic: إِذۡ عُرِضَ عَلَيۡهِ بِٱلۡعَشِيِّ ٱلصَّٰفِنَٰتُ ٱلۡجِيَادُ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: idh ʿuriḍa ʿalayhi bil-ʿashiyi al-ṣāfinātu al-jiyādu
